Call for Vigilance.name: Call for Vigilance
Call for Vigilance.fullText:
Dark Watcher Attack 11Call for Vigilance

An intangible field of protection unfurls around you, keeping a vigilant watch on your allies and blinding those who dare attack them.

Encounter        Shadow
Immediate Reaction      Close burst 5

Trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you attacks one or more of your allies.

Target: The triggering enemy in the burst

Effect: The target is blinded until the end of its next turn.


Published in Heroes of Shadow, page(s) 142.
Call for Vigilance.flavor: An intangible field of protection unfurls around you, keeping a vigilant watch on your allies and blinding those who dare attack them.

Trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you attacks one or more of your allies.

Target: The triggering enemy in the burst

Effect: The target is blinded until the end of its next turn.

Righteous Disruption.name: Righteous Disruption
Righteous Disruption.fullText:
Dark Watcher Attack 20Righteous Disruption

A ray of scintillating light and shadow strikes your foe, disrupting its life force and leaving it at your allies’ mercy.

Daily        Shadow
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Effect: Your allies gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +5 power bonus to damage rolls against the target. In addition, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls. These effects last until the end of the encounter.


Published in Heroes of Shadow, page(s) 142.
Righteous Disruption.flavor: A ray of scintillating light and shadow strikes your foe, disrupting its life force and leaving it at your allies’ mercy.
Righteous Disruption.range:
Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Effect: Your allies gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +5 power bonus to damage rolls against the target. In addition, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls. These effects last until the end of the encounter.
Righteous Disruption.effect: Your allies gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +5 power bonus to damage rolls against the target. In addition, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls. These effects last until the end of the encounter.

Constant Vigilance.name: Constant Vigilance
Constant Vigilance.fullText:
Dark Watcher Utility 12Constant Vigilance

You appear at the side of a dying ally to grant the power of healing.

Daily        Healing, Shadow, Teleportation
Immediate Reaction      Close burst 10

Trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you drops to 0 hit points or fewer.

Target: The triggering ally in the burst

Effect: You teleport adjacent to the target, and the target can spend a healing surge.


Published in Heroes of Shadow, page(s) 142.
Constant Vigilance.flavor: You appear at the side of a dying ally to grant the power of healing.
